usage: disco suggest [-h] [-b BPM] [-k KEY] [search_terms]

positional arguments:
  search_terms       track or release name you want to show a "track-
                     combination report" for.

optional arguments:
  -h, --help         show this help message and exit
  -b BPM, --bpm BPM  suggests tracks based on BPM value, within a pitch-range
                     of +/-6 percent.
  -k KEY, --key KEY  suggests tracks based on musical key.
